import React from 'react' class Search extends React.Component { state = { Search : '', } handleKey = (event) => { if(event.key === 'Enter') { this.props.searchValue(this.state.Search) } } handleFilter = (event) => { this.setState({type : event.target.dataset.type}) } render(){ return(
this.setState({Search : e.target.value}) } value={this.state.Search} onKeyDown={this.handleKey} id="text" type="search" placeholder='which movie you wanna search?' className="validate" />

) } } export default Search
